title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item the first time.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Observed Behavior (OB): When attempting to select an item, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior (EB): The selected item should be highlighted and remain in focus in the library outline view.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view, such as by clicking on it.
3. Verify that the selected item is not highlighted and the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
